title: Pixel 4XL camera no longer work. 2nd phone with this issue. How do I get a new phone from Fi?
content: I have updated, cleared cache/data, and done a factory reset. Nothing works. 2nd 4 XL with this issue, and 3rd Pixel 4XL in 3 months. I have device protection plan from Google Fi. All they will do is send me another refurbished replacement. How do I get a new, not refurb phone or a refund? I'm about done with these phones.
